member.summary: Represents a point mapper instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.CellSize
member.summary: Indicates cell size of pixels.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.Margin
member.summary: Indicates margin (pixel size of empty spaces between the fact sudoku grid and borders of the picture).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.RowsCount
member.summary: Indicates the number of rows. The number of rows should be an absolute value, including reserved regions (used by drawing outside-like puzzles).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.ColumnsCount
member.summary: Indiactes the number of columns. The number of columns should be an absolute value, including reserved regions (used by drawing outside-like puzzles).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.GridSize
member.summary: Indicates grid size instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.FullSize
member.summary: Indicates full canvas size instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.FullSizeInteger
member.summary: Indicates full canvas size instance, in integer format.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.GetTopLeftPoint(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns top-left position (point) of the specified absolute row and column absolute index.
member.returns: The point instance that represents the target top-left position.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Graphics.ReservedOutsideBlank
member.summary: Represents an encapsulated type that describes the number of cell units reserved to be empty in drawing on the border of grid in a canvas.
member.param: Indicates the number of cell units upside the canvas that will be reserved as blank in drawing.
Indicates the number of cell units downside the canvas that will be reserved as blank in drawing.
Indicates the number of cell units leftside the canvas that will be reserved as blank in drawing.
Indicates the number of cell units rightside the canvas that will be reserved as blank in drawing.

Indicates the number of cell units leftside the canvas that will be reserved as blank in drawing.
Indicates the number of cell units rightside the canvas that will be reserved as blank in drawing.
